NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . Sales Figures"[ Google CEO] Eric Schmidt pointed out that they're activating 200,000 units per day," Apple CEO Steve Jobs told media and analysts during an 20 October earnings call. By comparison, Apple has activated 270,000 units per day, on average. Since then, the two companies' other executives have used similar metrics- always in the hundreds-of-thousands range- to paint their respective smartphone platforms as unbeatable in the marketplace. , National Security Council meeting in which Colin Powell , then secretary of state, sketched out the presentation he was to make at the United Nations two days later. Donald Rumsfeld quotes himself as telling the meeting, We should hit Khurmal during the speech, given that Colin Powell will talk about it. Khurmal is the name of a village near the site.
